description:
Stress & Anxiety Management. Retrain Your Brain - Dr Elaine Ryan

Better than seeing me in person! You have lifetime access, not only to the course, but to everything that I add in the future.

This course replicates what you would get from me, if you saw me in person.

I am a Doctor of Psychology, and have a private practice in Ireland. I am the 'go to' expert in the country on stress and anxiety.

What is the course about?

The course is based on Cognitive Behavioural Therapy, Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction and Neuroscience

Many people do not need to see me in person, you get the same (and more) in my self help course, as you would if you saw me in person.

If you

  • have stress or anxiety
  • panic attacks
  • feel like a failure or that nothing works out for you, no matter how hard you try
  • get overwhelmed or stressed and anxious
  • have low self esteem

This course is designed, not only to help you understand why you are feeling this way, but tells you what to do to help yourself.

You will learn

  • How we are 'wired' to focus more on the negative
  • How we all have a background level of anxiety
  • How your brain results in stress and anxiety
  • How your brain 'holds on to' and remembers anxiety - this helps explain why you 'suddenly feel anxious for no reason.'
  • How your brain learns
  • How you have automatic beliefs about yourself, that are holding you back
title: Stress and Anxiety Management; the Scientific Guide
